trans-unit.source: Base class for all the chart elements.
trans-unit.target: Classe di base per tutti gli elementi del grafico.

trans-unit.source: The ChartElement class represents the most basic element of the chart element hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: La classe ChartElement rappresenta l'elemento di base della gerarchia dell'elemento del grafico.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement"></xref>.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Object>è uguale all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Object>è uguale all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una funzione hash per un particolare tipo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the hash code for the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta il codice hash per l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object associated with this chart element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un oggetto associato a questo elemento del grafico.

trans-unit.source: The Tag property can be used to store additional data with this chart element.
trans-unit.target: Il Tag (proprietà) può essere utilizzata per archiviare dati aggiuntivi con questo elemento del grafico.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> associated with this chart element.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>associata a questo elemento del grafico.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una stringa che rappresenta l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>
